name: Dataset machine-readable name
title: Dataset human-readable name
description: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to quickly understand whether the dataset is of interest
accessLevel: The degree to which this dataset could be made publicly-available, regardless of whether it has been made available.
rights: This may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies.
language: [list of languages used in the dataset]
languageCode: [list of language code used in the dataset]
conformsTo: URI used to identify a standardized specification the dataset conforms to
licenseTitle: The human-readable title of the license used
licenseID: The machine-readable identification of the license used
licenseUrl: The URL of the license used
metadataCreated: The creation date of the metadata
metadataModified: Most recent date on which the dataset metadata was changed, updated or modified

maintainer.name: Contact person name for the dataset maintainer
maintainer.email: Contact person name for the dataset maintainer
maintainer.role: Contact person role in the organization for the dataset maintainer

author.name: Contact person name for the dataset author
author.email: Contact person email for the dataset author
author.role: Contact person role in the organization for the dataset author

hasPart: The collection of which the dataset is a subset
ratingsAverage: Average score of the resource rating by users
dataQualityAverage: Average score of the objective data quality for the dataset

organization.name: Human-readable organization name
organization.description: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to have an overview of the organization
organization.organizationalUnit: An Organization such as a department or support unit which is part of some larger Organization and only has full recognition within the context of that Organization
organization.subOrganizationOf: Represents hierarchical containment of Organizations or OrganizationalUnits; indicates an organization which is a sub-part or child of this organization
organization.basedAt: Indicates the site at which a person is based. We do not restrict the possibility that a person is based at multiple sites

hasSite.siteAddress: human-readable address for the company's site

organization.hasUnit: Indicates a unit which is part of this Organization

resources.name: Resource machine-readable name
resources.title: Resource human-readable name
resources.description: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to quickly understand whether the resource is of interest
resources.type: The human-readable format of the resource
resources.downloadUrl: URL providing direct access to a dataset, for example via API or a graphical interface
resources.accessUrl: URL providing indirect access to a dataset, for example via API or a graphical interface
resources.format: A human-readable description of the file format of a distribution
resources.accessLevel: The degree to which this resource could be made publicly-available
resources.size: Actual size of the resource in bytes
resources.describedBy: URL to the data dictionary for the distribution found at the downloadUrl
resources.conformsTo: URI used to identify a standardized specification the distribution conforms to
resources.rating: Normalized score of the resource rating by users
resources.dataQuality: Score of the resource objective quality
resources.cacheUrl: A URL of the resource cache

temporal.temporalGranularity: The range of temporal granularity of a dataset
temporal.temporalCoverageFrom: Start date of applicability for the data
temporal.temporalCoverageTo: End date of applicability for the data

resources.created: The creation date of the resource
resources.modified: Most recent date on which the resource was changed, updated or modified
resources.cacheModified: Most recent date on which the resource cache was changed, updated or modified

groups.name: Group machine-readable name
groups.title: Group human-readable name
groups.description: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to quickly understand whether the group is of interest
groups.created: The creation date of the group
groups.modified: Most recent date on which the group was changed, updated or modified

administrator.name: Contact person name for the group administrator
administrator.email: Contact person name for the group administrator
administrator.role: Contact person name for the group administrator

groups.subGroupOf: Defines if the group is part of a parent group and specifies the parent group id

tags.name: Tag machine-readable name
tags.title: Tag human-readable name
tags.vocabularyId: Unique identifier of the tag vocabulary if any
tags.created: The creation date of the tag
tags.modified: Most recent date on which the tag was changed, updated or modified
